questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Architecture and buildings
D) Wildlife and animals

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A quiet street scene
D) An architectural detail

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A group of people
B) A clock tower
C) A landscape
D) An animal

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A beach
C) A clock face
D) A painting

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A mountain range
B) The sky and part of the building
C) A busy street
D) A river

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A garden
B) A clock tower
C) A crowd of people
D) A bridge

What time is shown on the clock in the photo?
A) 3:00
B) 6:00
C) 9:00
D) 12:00

What is the color of the clock face?  
A) Blue  
B) Brown  
C) White  
D) Red

What kind of numerals are used on the clock face?
A) Arabic numerals
B) Roman numerals
C) Binary numerals
D) Greek numerals

What decorative elements are present on the building?
A) Floral patterns
B) Geometric shapes
C) Sculpted faces and ornate designs
D) Plain surfaces

What additional element is visible in the photo besides the building and clock?
A) A tree
B) A bridge
C) Electrical wires
D) A car

What part of the building is directly beneath the clock?
A) A door
B) A window
C) A balcony
D) A statue

What color are the decorative elements on the building?
A) Green
B) Gold
C) Silver
D) White and brown

What is the shape of the window beneath the clock?
A) Circular
B) Square
C) Arched
D) Triangular

What is the purpose of the clock tower in the photo?
A) To serve as a landmark
B) To provide time information
C) To house offices
D) To display advertisements

What is the primary color of the building?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) White and brown
D) Yellow

What is the position of the clock hands in the photo?
A) Both hands at 12
B) Both hands at 6
C) One hand at 12, one at 6
D) One hand at 3, one at 9

How many columns are visible in the photo?
A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four

What is the color of the clock hands?
A) Black
B) White
C) Gold
D) Silver

What is the primary color of the building's trim?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) White
D) Green

What is the dominant architectural feature of the building?
A) The clock tower
B) The columns
C) The windows
D) The roof

How many decorative faces are visible on the columns?
A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four

What is the relationship between the clock and the rest of the building?
A) The clock is a separate structure
B) The clock is integrated into the building
C) The clock is an addition to the building
D) The clock is a temporary installation

What architectural feature is prominently displayed in the photo?
A) A bridge
B) A clock tower
C) A fountain
D) A statue

What is visible through the window below the clock?
A) A person
B) A bell
C) A flag
D) A tree
